title.rendered: Handyman Connection TV Wall Mount Service

content.rendered:
Handyman Connection TV Wall Mount Service

Sleek new TVs are only as good as their placement. Many come with mounts, but do you know how to set it up? Instead of bothering with an old boxy set, mounting your new flat screen TV gives the screen better visibility from anywhere in the room.

TV wall mount installation contractors from Handyman Connection come to your home on time and with friendly service. In addition to TV wall mounting, Handyman Connection can set up your entertainment system and hide extra cables. All you have to do is show us where to put your TV. We can also set up TVs above fireplaces, in bedrooms and even outdoors. Some of our TV wall mount services include:

  • Mounting TVs
  • Surround sound setup
  • Connecting TV to your components
  • Linking Wi-Fi to your TV
  • Programming remote controls

Call Us Today

Handyman Connection offers fast and friendly service to the whole York area. As the leading TV wall mount installation company, we are always ready to help. Thanks to Handyman of York, you can kick back and enjoy your new TV. Contact us today to learn more.
